price: "Isso, pelo que vossas mãos anteciparam!" E porque Allah não é injusto com os servos.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat aydīkum wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
